title: Legacy of Blood: A Comprehensive Guide to Slasher Movies
description: The "slasher" movie is the bloodiest incarnation of the modern horror film, tainted by criticisms of misogyny, yet remaining-on and off-a box-office draw for 30 years. Combining in-depth analysis with over 200 film reviews, Legacy of Blood is the most comprehensive examination of the slasher movie and its conventions to date, from Halloween and the notorious I Spit on Your Grave , to Scream -the redefining genre hit of the '90s-and beyond.
author: Jim Harper
